text: Podžaga () is a small settlement at the southern end of the Mišja dolina valley southwest of Velike Lašče in central Slovenia. The entire Municipality of Velike Lašče is part of the traditional Lower Carniola region and is included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Velike Lašče municipal site ==References== ==External links== * *Podžaga on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Velike Lašče
title: Podžaga
